name: Sex Detective [18+]
description:
Welcome to the captivating world of intrigue and investigation in the adult visual novel, Sex Detective [18+]. Imbued with an atmosphere of mystique and mystery, this thrilling narrative bursts with tension, sensuality, and unexpected twists.

Meet Robert, a private detective whose skills in uncovering the truth surpass all expectations. When a mysterious woman approaches him with a request to find her missing friend, Robert comes into his element. Blending sharp intellectual abilities with sensual allure, he embarks on his most challenging case.

Delving into the deep secrets of the underground world, Robert uncovers astonishing facts and encounters dangers lurking at every turn. Each transition in the game brings to light new secrets that form the foundation of the missing woman's puzzle.

Remember that "Sex Detective" is an adult-oriented visual novel that goes beyond ordinary investigations. In this world of crime and sexual allure, your choices have consequences, and unraveling dark secrets can reshape your perspective on events.

Prepare for an impressive journey of investigation and intense emotions in the adult visual novel "Sex Detective," where each step makes the narrative more captivating.

Features:

  • A Multitude of Sexy Situations
  • Fast-paced and intuitive gameplay
  • Real-time 3D character and animations
